title: Fps drop sometimes to 30 fps
body: Any one know why happinig my video card is amd r7 370 2 gb and i 5 4460 8 gb ram

replies.body:
Is there anything specific going on when your FPS drops or is it constant? If it's dropping in team fights that might just be due to what all is happening at once. Let's go ahead and make sure you've got your graphics drivers fully updated and double check that the windows game dvr is still turned off. 

This might also just be due to how graphically intense the new Overcharge game mode can be if that's where you're seeing these drops.
